Articles.Content:
Hello,

Recently I have been trying to get RSS working while still keeping a relatively simple stockalike experience, e.g. KSRSS which is a great mod that allows you to play on RSS yet in a stock scale. However, this mod only works properly in 1.8.1 despite versions of Kopernicus now updated to work in later versions, which is playable but I would much prefer being able to use the newer texture options, custom flags, etc to build stock crafts with that are only included in later versions. 

Does anybody know a way I can play on a reduced size RSS (like half, quarter or Kerbin size) that works in 1.10+?

Thanks.

On 2021/4/21 at AM4点15分, CaptainZulu said:

Thanks.

Ssrss is OK.
